Valve has been putting a lot of work into CS:GO. The BR update seemed to take some of the developer focus away from the game, but with the AUG changes and Vertigo being reworked, it is hard to claim that Valve has given up on the game. Valve should continue trying new things with CS, even if they disrupt the meta.
this is a very good game
